pr_title: Add more test cases for multiple WDT model file ordering

timeline.message: Add first test case for multiple model file use case
Partial work for the second multi-model case

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/develop' into mii-multi-model-image-cm

Conflicts:
	new-integration-tests/src/test/java/oracle/weblogic/kubernetes/ItMiiMultiModel.java
	new-integration-tests/src/test/java/oracle/weblogic/kubernetes/utils/CommonTestUtils.java
Change ItMiiConfigMap and ItMiiConfigMapOverride to use the common test utils

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/develop' into mii-multi-model-image-cm

Conflicts:
	new-integration-tests/src/test/java/oracle/weblogic/kubernetes/utils/CommonTestUtils.java

timeline.bodyText: will this work if the domains are running?
timeline.author: sankarpn

replies.bodyText: Probably not. Let me check. If not, I'll delete the domains first.
replies.author: doxiao

replies.bodyText: Added deletion of domains before deleting the image.
replies.author: doxiao

replies.bodyText: I see deleting image works before deleting the domain..
replies.author: vanajamukkara

replies.bodyText: not sure if domain deletion will have issues though
replies.author: vanajamukkara

replies.bodyText: With the change, we are doing what we do in ItMiiDomain.
replies.author: doxiao

replies.bodyText: In addition, I tested the current version and found no problem and the image was removed.
replies.author: doxiao

replies.bodyText: I re-tested both cases, and either way worked without problem:).
replies.author: doxiao

replies.bodyText: I recall that a Docker image cannot be deleted if there are containers using it. The containers have to be stopped first. So I think it is probably safer to delete the domain before deleting the image. This is also what we have been doing in ItMiiDomain.
replies.author: doxiao
